description:
Pascal`s taken off early for summer break, but where could he have gone? Can Steve`s super-sleuth hound piece together the clues? Meanwhile, a stranger in a strange land finds society shuns his customs, and Pascal shows you don`t need to be rich to eat like a king.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Follow Him!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Yum! Pascal Gourmet
Tsuiseki!! Pascal-sensei / Perfect Plate / Zeppin! Pascal Gourmet
追跡!! パスカル先生 / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート / 絶品! パスカルグルメ
